body:
Comment 1: 
Windows port is still a work in progress.  This is one of the things that isn't done.
On a Mac I get:


$ 6.out
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x50 pc=0x5c9d]

runtime.panic+0xa7 /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1023
	runtime.panic(0x5016c, 0xf8400013f0)
runtime.panicstring+0xa3 /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:92
	runtime.panicstring(0xeda9f, 0xf840001260)
runtime.sigpanic+0x144 /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/darwin/thread.c:469
	runtime.sigpanic()
runtime.mapassign1+0x9 /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/hashmap.c:892
	runtime.mapassign1(0x0, 0x3b3c8)
main.main+0x6c /Users/rsc/x.go:21
	main.main()
runtime.mainstart+0xf /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/amd64/asm.s:77
	runtime.mainstart()
runtime.goexit /Users/rsc/g/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:149
	runtime.goexit()
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #1001._
